direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve operations related to BUSD auto-conversion settings.
Both methods handle BUSD conversion but with different operations (query vs. execute).
Both methods involve querying BUSD-related transactions with similar parameter handling.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require the RequestHandler to be initialized for API requests.
Environment setup is required before querying BUSD auto-conversion settings.
Both methods handle API responses and need to verify the response format and content.
